title: LFM - semi serious team
body:
Jg and Top looking to form a team for competitive play. Sydney based and play most evenings. Please msg if interested

Chur!

replies.body: add me Mr Froggy support main lookin for a semi serious/serious team
If there is room i wouldn't mind joining i main top but can support, jg or mid if needed :D

Hey mate,

Two friends and I have been searching for 2 more players to make a ranked team together.

Mid - Satsii
ADC - peemac
Sup - me (DaVone)

Happy to include you should you still be looking :), we're always looking to improve our play and we're on most nights too.

Cheers.
Did you say chur when ur from aus
lol I'm a kiwi in Oz
gday mate, i main support and am looking to play some ranked teams, i'd join you guys :)
